descriptionHtml: Telusian Tega is a master mage, hailing from Skyrim. He is a nord, equipped with archmage robes. He is currently level 100, with a decreased state to keep him from being overpowered. He is quite powerful and friendly, perfect for a quest buddy. He knows the spells firebolt and ice spike, and is used to the bow.=============================Found in Riverwood. Walk past Alvor's house, and take a left on the small bridge leading near the wood factory.Â ========================Compatable with many of the multiple followers mods.===============================WARNING: Set to agressive or very agressive. Having a bounty will cause him to attack any enemy in your path. He will not attack any non-enemies unless provoked.=======================GLITCHES THAT MAY HAPPEN: He will randomly attack citizens or animals that are not your enemy. (VERY UNCOMMON)
author: xxcolorbmmxx
